SEARCH
Package com.example.cab302project.models

Interface IUserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteUserDAO
public interface IUserDAO
Implementation of classes that interact with the persistence layer, Allows for CRUD operations

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the persistence layer. Implementations should handle checking for duplicate users (e.g., by email or username) before insertion.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the details of the user to add.

    • getUserByUsername

      User getUserByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a user from the persistence layer based on their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object matching the username, or null if no such user exists.

    • getUserByEmail

      User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user from the persistence layer based on their email address. This method is marked as optional in the original comment, but defined in the interface.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object matching the email, or null if no such user exists.

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String email, String password)
      Validates a user's credentials for login purposes. Checks if a user exists with the provided email and password combination.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      password - The password provided by the user.
      Returns:
      true if a user with the matching email and password exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user from the persistence layer based on their username. This method is marked as optional in the original comment, but defined in the interface. Implementations should consider cascading deletes for related data (e.g., friend requests, events).
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to delete.

    • userExists

      boolean userExists(String email)
      Checks if a user exists in the persistence layer based on their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if a user with the given email exists, false otherwise.

    • updateEmail

      boolean updateEmail(String currentEmail, String newEmail)
      Updates the email address for a user.
      Parameters:
      currentEmail - The current email address of the user.
      newEmail - The new email address for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the email was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • updatePassword

      boolean updatePassword(String email, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      newPassword - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • sendFriendRequest

      boolean sendFriendRequest(String senderUsername, String receiverUsername)
      Sends a friend request from one user to another.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - The username of the user sending the request.
      receiverUsername - The username of the user receiving the request.
      Returns:
      true if the friend request was successfully initiated, false otherwise

    • acceptFriendRequest

      boolean acceptFriendRequest(String senderUsername, String receiverUsername)
      Accepts a pending friend request. Updates the status of a friend request between two users.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - The username of the user who sent the request.
      receiverUsername - The username of the user who is accepting the request.
      Returns:
      true if a pending request was found and accepted, false otherwise.

    • declineFriendRequest

      boolean declineFriendRequest(String senderUsername, String receiverUsername)
      Declines a pending friend request. Updates the status of a friend request between two users.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - The username of the user who sent the request.
      receiverUsername - The username of the user who is declining the request.
      Returns:
      true if a pending request was found and declined, false otherwise.

    • updateBio

      boolean updateBio(String email, String newBio)
      Updates the bio for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      newBio - The new bio text for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the bio was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • updateProfileImage

      boolean updateProfileImage(String email, byte[] imageData)
      Updates the profile image for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      imageData - A byte array containing the image data. Can be null to remove the image.
      Returns:
      true if the profile image was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • getProfileImage

      byte[] getProfileImage(String email)
      Retrieves the profile image data for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      Returns:
      A byte array containing the profile image data, or null if no image is set or the user is not found.

    • getPendingFriendRequests

      List<User> getPendingFriendRequests(String username)
      Retrieves a list of users who have sent a pending friend request to the specified user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user checking for pending requests.
      Returns:
      A List of User objects representing the senders of pending requests. Returns an empty list if no pending requests exist or the user is not found.

    • getFriends

      List<User> getFriends(String username) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of friends (users linked by 'accepted' friend requests) for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose friends are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of User objects representing the user's friends. Returns an empty list if the user is not found or has no friends.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs during the operation.
